direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate strings of fixed lengths, but fixedString uses sentences while maxLengthSentence uses a single sentence with a fixed length.
Both methods handle the generation of strings with fixed lengths, but characters focuses on character generation while fixedString uses sentences.
fixedString relies on the sentence method to generate sentences, which are then used to build the fixed-length string.
Both methods generate text with a specified structure (sentences for fixedString and paragraphs for paragraph), but with different granularities.
Both fixedString and resolve methods are part of the text generation process, with resolve providing the underlying data for words and sentences.
